MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell affecting properties in Lomond Walk and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.14am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to difficulties locating the cause of the fault and to arrange for generators, our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.54am on Friday 23rd October 2020.
